column5: I went for a bicycle ride today. East wind in Barrie has blown the remaining ice on Kempenfelt Bay to wards the Barrie shoreline right now. About a 100 metres worth. Lots of people fishing the marina which only had a little bit of frazzle ice in the one corner. Only saw perch being caught. It was good to see lots of families fishing.
I have photos,check it out. Seen lots of perch being caught earlly this AM.

Thanks for the report Rob, havent made it down to the waterfront myself in a little bit, i stopped by the water front last and fished off the boat launch dock and there was still a ton of ice out there.
